front.title: Presence and Instant Messaging Protocol (PRIM)Server-Server Protocol Specification

abstract.t: The architecture and specifications of the Presence and InstantMessaging protocols (PRIM) are described. PRIM defines a set ofprotocols for the Presence and Instant Messaging services whichsatisfy the IMPP requirements [RFC2779]. PRIM is also designed so asto conform with the Common Profile for Instant Messaging (CPIM)specification being developed in the IMPP WG. This memo describesthe PRIM Server-Server protocol specification.
